main event: Two witnesses observed an unidentified flying object near Marshfield, Missouri, on September 22, 1954.
interesting points: The object was a boomerang shape with dark tan color and two black stripes,The object emitted a puff of white smoke as it descended,The witnesses reported the object was silent during the observation,The object was observed hovering and climbing without changing its appearance,No physical evidence was found at the landing site except for a patch of ground that was pulverized.
sighted object: a boomerang-shaped object emitting white smoke
witness description: Employees of Westover Gas Company, both considered reliable witnesses.
